ai-patthana8.72:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in SN 4.)
ai-patthana8.72:1.1_0: Consciousness doesn’t arise dependent on the thought that gives rise to diversity.
ai-patthana8.72:2.1_0: it doesn’t give rise to the un causes.
ai-patthana8.72:4.1_0: for the sake of letting go, two results, together with the five results of deeds ...
